name: Cubgrade
description:
• This game has no stories, it's a top-down shooter where you play a cube and destroy, your enemies try to get the highest score, you can buy upgrades, but you will need to sacrifice your score so do as you wish, also you can eat bread to have a bonus on score the basic is x2 if you ate 30 bread it will be x3.
  • Quick note, the leaderboard is online so you will see your score on the leaderboard tab.
  • Inputs: The options inputs setting is little buggy but i changed the button to QWERTY keyboard format because i know AZERTY peoples don't exists :) 
    • UP: W
    • DOWN: S
    • LEFT: A
    • RIGHT: D
    • SHOP : ESCAPE
